cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6387, School and Daycare Protection Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 8 (Wednesday, January 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PAYNE:
H.R. 6387.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to Article I, Section 8
[Page H78]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
